TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DetailsViewDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataBoundControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控制是保持为标记源代码，编辑向网页上的标记。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 属性类提供了以下功能：The properties of the class provide the following functionality: - 属性返回对象，它通常包含一个对象，派生自的继承树中的每个级别的设计器类。The property returns a object, which typically contains an object that is derived from the class for each level in the inheritance tree of the designer. - 属性返回的格式设置以在中显示的方案集合**自动套用格式**对话框。The property returns a collection of formatting schemes for display in the **Auto Format** dialog box. - 属性返回的字段的关联的模板组集合控制和顶级模板。The property returns a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control and the top level templates. - 属性始终返回`true`，，该值指示设计器将创建关联的临时副本控件来生成设计时标记。The property always returns `true`, indicating that the designer creates a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 类方法提供以下功能：The class methods provide the following functionality: - 方法将绑定关联到设计时数据源的控件。The method binds the associated control to a design-time data source. - 方法返回用于呈现关联的标记在设计时。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated at design time. - 方法准备设计器，以查看、 编辑和设计关联。The method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated . - 时关联的设计时视图的区域，方法调用单击。The method is called when a region of the design-time view of the associated is clicked. - 时调用方法关联的数据源的架构更改。The method is called when the schema of the data source of the associated changes. - 方法用于删除或添加其他属性或隐藏的关联属性。The method is used to remove or add additional properties or to shadow properties of the associated . 中不支持设计时可编辑区域控件，因此和方法具有任何功能。Design-time editable regions are not supported in the control, so the and methods have no functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何扩展类更改派生自的控件的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to extend the class to change the appearance of controls that are derived from the control at design time. 该示例从`MyDetailsView`控件从。The example derives the `MyDetailsView` control from the . `MyDetailsView`只是一个副本的控件。The `MyDetailsView` is simply a copy of the control. 该示例还从`MyDetailsViewDesigner`类并放置对象`MyDetailsViewDesigner`上`MyDetailsView`控件。The example also derives the `MyDetailsViewDesigner` class from and places a object for `MyDetailsViewDesigner` on the `MyDetailsView` control. `The MyDetailsViewDesigner` 重写属性指定的设计时视图的页导航行`MyDetailsView`包含五个页面链接。`The MyDetailsViewDesigner` overrides the property to specify that the pager row of the design-time view of the `MyDetailsView` contain five page links. 它将重写方法来执行属性显示在**属性**网格在设计时。It overrides the method to make the property visible in the **Property** grid at design time. 它将重写方法以包括属性，如果它指定的为新的第一行`MyDetailsView`网格在设计时。It overrides the method to include the property, if it is specified, as a new first row in the `MyDetailsView` grid at design time. 如果属性`MyDetailsView`是或值，绘制的控件，以使其范围更明显周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the `MyDetailsView` is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例类时创建关联控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

The associated with this designer.

value.span: 一个 ，它包含 的预定义方案。

span.span: A that contains the predefined schemes for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 填充从 XML 编码的内部类的成员。The is populated from an XML-encoded member of an internal class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 要绑定到设计时数据源的 控件。

span.span: The control to bind to the design-time data source.

summary.span: 将关联控件绑定到设计时数据源。

span.span: Binds the associated control to the design-time data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将绑定关联控件拖到设计时数据源和计算的页导航和自动生成是必需的基于为指定的功能的行数。The method binds the associated control to the design-time data source and calculates the number of pager and automatically generated rows that are required, based on features that are specified for the . `dataBoundControl`参数表示与此设计器中或一份该控件相关联的控件。The `dataBoundControl` parameter represents the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of that control.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的 控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先，方法设置属性控制转移到`true`，如果集合为空。First, the method sets the property of the control to `true`, if the collection is empty. 然后设置集合控件添加到一个空数组如果无法获取数据源的架构。The then sets the collection of the control to an empty array if the schema of the data source cannot be obtained. 它将刷新对象以强制要调用方法。It refreshes the object to force the method to be called. 然后，它调用基方法，以生成标记。It then calls the base method to generate the markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写从继承类中的方法类更改的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 该示例将新的第一行添加到要包含的网格属性，如果定义。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果派生自的控件属性是或值，绘制的控件，以使其范围更明显周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the control that is derived from is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果你重写方法，一定要调用基方法，因为它最终，经过多级重写时，调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method because it eventually, through several override levels, calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: 一个 ，它将向其中添加控件设计时视图的可选择和可单击区域的定义。

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用方法来生成用于在设计时呈现标记控件。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 方法还使用填充`regions`与为设计时呈现的每个可单击或可选区域的对象。The method also populates `regions` with a object for each clickable or selectable region of the design-time rendering. 有关，是可选择的每个行中的第一个单元，在行中的所有单元格都可单击。For the , the first cell in each row is selectable; all the cells in the rows are clickable. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类更改的外观控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the appearance of the control at design time. 该示例将新的第一行添加到要包含的网格属性，如果定义。The example adds a new first row to the grid to contain the property, if the is defined. 如果派生自的控件属性是或值，绘制的控件，以使其范围更明显周围的蓝色虚线的边框。If the property of the control that is derived from the is the or value, the draws a blue dashed border around the control to make its extent more visible. 它不会更改控件的运行时外观。It does not change the run-time appearance of the control. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#4)]

para.span: 如果你重写方法，一定要调用基类方法或重载，因为它们最终，经过多级重写时，调用上控件或控件来生成标记的副本。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method or the overload because they eventually, through several override levels, call on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , control which implements an .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在设计器宿主调用方法准备设计器用于呈现时控件。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 其基方法配置属性，并设置所需的设计器操作的事件。The and its base methods configure properties and set up events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数表示与此设计器或一份该控件相关联的控件。The `component` parameter represents the control that is associated with this designer or a copy of that control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnClick(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnClick (e As DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs)

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，它定义控件的被单击区域。

span.span: A that defines the clicked region of the control.

summary.span: 当单击关联控件设计时视图的区域时，会调用它。

span.span: Called when a region of the design-time view for the associated control is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法保存所选的区域索引并更新呈现的标记设计图面上的控件。The method saves the selected region index and updates the markup that renders the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed

summary.span: 当关联控件的数据源架构更改时，将调用它。

span.span: Called when the schema of the data source for the associated control changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非设计器处于编辑模式或字段的模板是正在添加或编辑，方法调用方法，后者反过来调用方法来更新控件以反映数据源更改。Unless the designer is in template editing mode or a field is being added or edited, the method calls the method, which in turn calls the method to update the control to reflect the data source change.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器使用，以从 网格的显示中移除属性或向其添加属性或者隐藏关联控件的属性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove properties from or add properties to the display in the grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用派生自方法隐藏各种控件属性，用相应的设计时属性设计器实现，并将添加到属性或删除属性从`Properties`网格。Control designers use methods derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add properties to or remove properties from the `Properties` grid. 有关控件，方法设置对象属性`false`控件时在模板模式下。For the control, the method sets the object of the property to `false` when the control is in template mode. 这可以确保不能使用删除在模板模式下的列`Fields`对话框。This ensures that a column that is in template mode cannot be deleted using the `Fields` dialog box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写继承自的类方法类更改`Properties`网格控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the method in a class that is inherited from the class to change the `Properties` grid of the control at design time. 示例使属性显示在`Properties`网格。The example makes the property visible in the `Properties` grid. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#3)]

para.span: 重写方法可以将属性添加到或更改的设计时属性集合中的属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property SampleRowCount As Integer
protected: virtual property int SampleRowCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取要显示的关联控件的示例行数。

span.span: Gets the number of sample rows for the associated control to display.
The number of sample rows to show.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性始终返回数`2`。The property always returns the number `2`. 这将导致两个页面链接的页导航行中显示控件在设计时。This causes two page links to be displayed in the pager row of the control at design time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写类中的属性从继承类更改的页导航行中显示的页链接数控件在设计时。The following code example shows how to override the property in a class inherited from the class to change the number of page links appearing in the pager row of the control at design time. 此示例将导致五个要显示的页面链接。The example causes five page links to be displayed. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/CS/detailsviewdesigner.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DetailsViewDesigner/VB/detailsviewdesigner.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法没有任何功能; 没有可编辑区域的设计时视图中不支持控件。The method has no functionality; there is no support for editable regions in the design-time view of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TemplateGroups As TemplateGroupCollection

summary.span: 获取用于关联控件字段的模板组集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of template groups for the fields of the associated control.

value.span: 一个 ，其中为 控件中的每个模板化字段包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each templated field in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造的集合对象、 一个用于每个模板化数据字段，一个中每个控件字段 （如页眉、 页脚和页导航） 关联控件。The property constructs a collection of objects, one for each templated data field and one for each control field (such as header, footer, and pager) in the associated control. 数据字段元素具有为每个预定义的行模板类型的对象。The data field elements have a object for each of the predefined row template types. 控件字段元素包含单个。The control field elements contain a single .

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示设计器是否应使用临时副本（而非与设计器关联的实际控件）来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy, rather than the actual control associated with the designer, to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为属性始终是`true`，该设计器使用包含一份关联的控件控件来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控制不影响任何持久性。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果属性已被重写以返回`false`，设计器将使用关联控件本身来生成设计时标记。If the property has been overridden to return `false`, the designer will use the associated control itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以重写属性以返回或者想要确定基于是否将控件标记具有类级别其值对象。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class level object.

para.span: 如果不重写，对象将忽略。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the object ignores the .
